title: Thank god that's over.
text: The best and most annoying fight of the expansion so far.

title: 1/2 - Time for some Restless nights on Uu'nat
text: That's strange, I've never died at that point before. I use the same CDs every pull.

title: I couldn't be more... proud.
text: Our best ever finish again! Farewell to all those that are quitting the game.

title: We've only G'huun and done it!
text: After a sketchy start, the tier is finally over, netting us a decent rank: world 271st, realm 8th.

title: Zul, Reborn, Redead
text: We took a very subtle approach for this fight - as a result, the boss got eviscerated.

title: When the thrasher gets thrashed
text: Some trouble killing this one, but big doggo is finally dead. As you can see, this is a 74.6 FPS screenshot, high quality stuff.

title: We're not dead, just not very good at updating our website.
text: This is mainly to say that the first 4 Uldir bosses fell fairly quickly, and that we're still killing baddies. Join us!

title: Mythic Argus down!
text: Well, we finally killed it! Bit of a tough one for us but we got there in the end. Video coming soon..ish
